alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rensselaer; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rensselaer County through 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Sand Lake, or near Troy, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Grafton, Berlin, West Sand Lake, Center Brunswick, Wyantskill, Averill Park, Wynantskill, North Greenbush, Brunswick, Sand Lake, Pittstown, Poestenkill, South Troy, Albia, Johnsonville, Millers Corners, Taborton, Barberville and Tamarack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central New York.
